name: youtube-highlights
title: YouTube Highlights
description: Capture and manage highlights from YouTube videos with timestamps
author: itskofio

commands.name: create-highlight
commands.title: Create Highlight
commands.description: Capture a highlight from the active YouTube video

commands.name: view-highlights
commands.title: View Recent Highlights
commands.description: View all highlights in reverse chronological order

preferences.name: highlightDuration
preferences.title: Highlight Duration
preferences.description: Duration in seconds to capture before the current time (default: 30)

preferences.name: checkArc
preferences.label: Enable Arc Browser
preferences.description: Check for YouTube videos in Arc

preferences.name: showNoteInput
preferences.label: Show note input after highlight
preferences.description: Prompt for a note after creating a highlight

scripts.dev:clean: pkill -f "ray develop" || true && npm run dev
scripts.dev:probe: pkill -f "ray develop" || true && DEBUG_PROBE_MODE=true DEBUG_PROBE_TIMEOUT=15000 npm run dev
scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
